DOC.brief_summary: Phase IIA , multicenter , dose escalation study evaluate safety efficacy weekly S-8184 paclitaxel injectable emulsion second line treatment patient relapse stage IIIB IV non small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy S-8184 Second Line Treatment Relapsed Stage IIIB IV Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The goal study determine objective response rate , determine time disease progression , duration response , survival , identify maximum tolerated weekly dose principal toxicity S-8184 patient population .
DOC.criteria: Histologic diagnosis non small cell lung cancer Relapsed unresectable stage IIIB IV disease One one prior cytotoxic chemotherapy regimen must include platinum agent dose 60 mg/m2 high per cycle cisplatin AUC 6 per cycle carboplatin Documented response least stable disease first line therapy Adult ( 18 year age old ) patient Adequate hematologic function ( ANC great 1500 cells/mm3 platelet great 100,000/mm3 ) Serum creatinine le 2.0 mg/dL Total bilirubin le 1.5 mg/dL ; SGOT SGPT less 3 time upper limit institutional normal value ECOG performance status 0 2 Bidimensional measurable clinically evaluable disease Patients sign IRB / Ethics Committee approve informed consent Life expectancy least 12 week Patient fully recover previous surgery ( least 4 week since major surgery ) Patient negative pregnancy test prior study entry premenopausal . ( Patients child bear potential must use medically effective form contraception treatment . ) Patients receive taxanecontaining preparation include Taxol ( paclitaxel ) Taxotere ( docetaxel ) Patients intracranial metastasis neurologic function stabilize less 4 week prior study entry Females pregnant lactating Patients peripheral neuropathy NCICTC grade 2 great Patients receive widefield radiation , cytotoxic chemotherapy hormonal therapy within 4 week study entry ; mitomycin nitrosoureas within 6 week study entry Patients investigational agent within 4 week study entry Patients receive concurrent anticonvulsant know induce P450 isoenzymes
